Articles.Content:
It's been long since i last played KSP so, i installed some mods, started up the game and went on, messed around a bit in Sandbox only to discover that "weird square-shaped texture/particle deadzone"

 

It only appears when looking at the ship at specific angles, like looking down straight at the command capsule's parachute.

 

sorry, no picture. can't post pictures at imgur due to pic loading fail ;-;
nvm i fixed it by re installing scatterer
